meanings.definition: To stimulate excessively or beyond normal levels.
meanings.sent1: The loud music hyperstimulated my senses.
meanings.sent2: The teacher's energetic speech hyperstimulated the students' interest in the topic.
meanings.sent3: The hyperstimulating movie made everyone jump in their seats.
meanings.sent4: The intense workout hyperstimulated my muscles, leaving me exhausted.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors and fast pace of the video game were hyperstimulating.

meanings.sent1: The hyperstimulating lights at the party were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent2: The roller coaster ride was so hyperstimulating that it left me breathless.
meanings.sent3: The hyperstimulating flavors of the dish surprised my taste buds.
meanings.sent4: The hyperstimulating atmosphere of the concert filled the air with energy.
meanings.sent5: The hyperstimulating performance left the audience in awe.
